people.name: Dami
people.description: For the sake of convenience, we kindly ask that you monetize all gifts.

stories.title: How We Met
stories.description:
We Met on Twitter.. Yes! Our love story started from the DM üòÄ
We both come to Canada for our Masters Program, but we were studying in different schools. My school organized a seminar on Cybersecurity and privacy. I had no idea what all of that was, but everyone was talking about the guest speaker - Edward Snowden. I googled and it seemed interesting, so I joined the seminar.

stories.title: How We Met
stories.description:
Like every story ever told, there are two sides, and here is the original version.
Big man came to Canada for greener pastures, and greener pastures he found. During my Masters program, a coursework required us to listen in on a podcast by Edward Snowden, who was giving a talk at Simon Fraser University organized event. I almost stabbed as I felt it was irrelevant and I could always stream the recording later‚Ä¶but I had a rethink, I didn‚Äôt want money to waste and moreover, it was time to leave stabbing behind with my CU days.

stories.title: How We Met
stories.description:
I started tweeting about the seminar with the event‚Äôs hashtag and I came across Farabale‚Äôs tweets, so I RT‚Äôed. That‚Äôs how Oga came into the DM with his credentials (I‚Äôm in school studying this, my BSc was in that). Lool who asked you sir, am I a recruiter? ü§£
We became friends, our first meet up was a date to the African store üòÄ Juwon had been in Vancouver for 4 months (JJC) and had never been to the African store. We became quite close, and on July 10, 2016, he asked me to be his girlfriend. Well I said No! üòú I came to Canada to study, not to catch feelings.

stories.title: How We Met
stories.description:
Anyways fast forward to why you are here‚Ä¶The session went well and I went on a twitter rant, which i never do, to give my two cents about the event. A particular retweet caught my attention (yes, RTs are endorsements, argue with your keypad) from one OLUWADA-EMI-LOLA, whose location was British Columbia and I decided to take a stroll into the DM, nothing serious, no harm intended.
It took a few weeks before we finally met (someone was doing plenty shakara). She was writing exams at that time; and she too sabi book; so had to wait till she was done. Well the Yoruba Angel swag could not be resisted forever and the rest, as they say is history.

stories.title: How We Met
stories.description: After doing shakara for about a year, I finally agreed to date Juwon the same day I completed my Masters program (April 10, 2017). Best decision ever!! He asked me to marry him on July 10, 2019.. this time around, it was a resounding YES! Yes to forever with you, baby ‚ù§

stories.title: How We Met
stories.description: I finally got rewarded for being an OG on twitter. Can‚Äôt say Jack didn‚Äôt do anything for me no more. She‚Äôs been my partner in crime ever since and we intend to figure out this life thing together.

bride.description: He is a very good friend, he always supports me when I need his help. I always call him when I need someone to hear me out and someone to share the news with, weather they are good or bad ‚Äì I know I can always rely on him is me.
